name: BluetoothRemoteGATTDescriptor.value
description: The BluetoothRemoteGATTDescriptor.value read-only property returns an ArrayBuffer containing the currently cached descriptor value. This value gets updated when the value of the descriptor is read.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The BluetoothRemoteGATTDescriptor.value read-only property returnsan ArrayBuffer containingthe currently cached descriptor value. This value gets updated when the value of the descriptor is read.
